hero.title: Reflect, experiment, notice
hero.lead: Short reads with coaching questions to help you pause, breathe, and choose your next experiment.
intro: These short reads help you pause, notice patterns and experiment gently between sessions.
They invite reflection and learning – they are not medical, legal, financial or immigration advice.

fallbackNotice: These pieces were written as reflective placeholders while we prepare new stories.

posts.title: A kinder way to restart
summary: When you’re stuck, smaller and gentler beats louder and bigger.
Momentum returns when actions fit your current capacity.

cta.title: Ready to explore this in conversation?
body: Coaching offers a confidential space to turn these reflections into choices you own.
